chapters.title: Prologue: Glimmers of the Pattern
chapters.info: Ferane Neheran, p. 51 (45)—Aes Sedai of the White Ajah in Tar Valon. She stepped down from the Hall of the Tower about ten years ago, but was recently re-appointed to the Hall by the White Ajah; no sister has ever rejoined the hall that quickly. She is the First Reasoner, the head of the White Ajah, according to Seaine.
